thread.title: Hotel Atmosphere
thread.title_full: Hotel Atmosphere - Review of Hotel Atmospheres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sc0ttaberdeen
title: Hotel Atmosphere
text: Lovely hotel ideally situated to take in the many sights of Paris. Clean, modern hotel with friendly staff. Cannot fault them at all and would recommend the hotel to all friends and family . The staff were great with ability to swap between French and English easily to help. Great for breakfast and with lots of local restaurants and shops around this makes an ideal hotel for a short break.
